text: Aleksandr Ladeyshchikov (born August 26, 1979) is a Russian former sprinter. Along with Ruslan Mashchenko, Boris Gorban, and Andrey Semyonov, he won a silver medal in the 4 × 400 m relay at the 2001 IAAF World Indoor Championships. == References == * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male sprinters Category:World Athletics Indoor Championships medalists
title: Aleksandr Ladeyshchikov
